code: import React from'react';export var AxisY=function AxisY(props){var result=[];var upper_index=props.upper_bound/10;var lower_index=props.lower_bound/10;var lines_number=upper_index-lower_index;var frame=props.dimensions.height/lines_number;var x=0;var y=0;for(var i=lower_index;i<=upper_index;i++){result.push(make_y_tick(-20,props.dimensions.height-frame*(i-lower_index),i*10));}var line="M ".concat(x," ").concat(y," L ").concat(x," ").concat(y+props.dimensions.height);return React.createElement("g",null,React.createElement("g",{transform:"translate(".concat(-(props.dimensions.x_trans/2+10),",").concat(props.dimensions.height/2,")")},React.createElement("text",{x:"0",textAnchor:"middle",transform:"rotate(-90 0,0)",class:"plot_yaxis_title",y:"0"},React.createElement("tspan",null,props.y_label))),get_y_ticks(props.dimensions.height,props.y_number),result,React.createElement("path",{d:line,fill:"none",class:"plot_line","data-z-index":"0"}));};export default AxisY;function make_y_tick(x,y,value){return React.createElement("text",{x:x,textAnchor:"end",class:"plot_ytick",y:y},value);}function make_yy_tick(x,y){var line="M ".concat(x-10," ").concat(y," L ").concat(x," ").concat(y);return React.createElement("path",{d:line,fill:"none",class:"plot_line","data-z-index":"0"});}function get_y_ticks(height,lines_number){var result=[];var frame=height/lines_number;for(var i=0;i<=lines_number;i++){var point=frame*i;result.push(make_yy_tick(0,point));}return result;}
